value.title: Better AI Stock: Tesla vs. Alphabet
value.excerpt: Tesla also has an opportunity in AI with its Dojo proprietary supercomputer, which it says will significantly lower the cost of training AI models. It will also allow Tesla to sell cloud infrastructure services, putting it in direct competition with cloud titans like Amazon, Microsoft, and Alphabet.

value.title: The company powering the AI revolution is quite happy to let staff keep WFH
value.excerpt: Nvidia, which makes chips used for AI software like ChatGPT, says flexible work helps attract and retain staff and lets them balance their "personal and work obligations."

value.title: China says it will closely follow proposed US move on AI chip curbs
value.excerpt: China's foreign ministry said on Friday the country will closely follow possible moves by the United States to close a loophole that gives Chinese companies access to American artificial intelligence chips through units located overseas.

value.title: Energy Dept. funded JetCool nets $17M to disrupt chip cooling as AI workloads surge
value.excerpt: JetCool's technology is enabling 30% faster processing while reducing energy consumption by 50% and water usage by 90% over air cooling.

value.title: Rule Curbing AI Chip Exports to China Under Final Review
value.excerpt: (Reuters) - A U.S. rule that restricts shipments of certain advanced chips to China has been revised and is under final review, according to a government posting, suggesting that further curbs on chips that can be used for artificial intelligence are coming soon.

value.title: AI industry set to use as much energy as countries like Sweden or the Netherlands, study finds
value.excerpt: AI comes with a huge carbon footprint and its development could see the industry's energy consumption match levels of an entire country by 2027, a study has found.

value.title: Bank Of America Identifies 6 Global AI Stocks As 'Hidden Gems' With Great Potential
value.excerpt: Bank of America has highlighted five global stocks poised to profit as the application of artificial intelligence (AI) continues to burgeon. The bank projects significant growth potential for “end-device AI,” a deviation from the current server-based systems.

value.title: China may have access to powerful AI chips because of partnership with Saudi Arabia, claims report

value.title: Qualcomm Teases Snapdragon X Chips As AI PC Battle Heats Up With Intel And AMD
value.excerpt: Qualcomm said its upcoming Snapdragon X chips for PCs will contain the legally contested custom Oryon CPU design, setting the stage for increased rivalry against Intel and AMD.

value.title: NVIDIA Powers First GPU-Accelerated 5G Network
value.excerpt: NTT DOCOMO announced the world's first GPU-accelerated commercial Open RAN 5G built on NVIDIA, Fujitsu, and Wind River technology.

value.title: OpenAI is reportedly developing its own chips to combat GPU shortages
value.excerpt: OpenAI, the world's leading artificial intelligence company, has hinted at powering its AI tools with in-house chips to combat the GPU shortage.

value.title: Generative AI Throwdown: Open Source Vs. Proprietary Models
value.excerpt: Generative AI, dominated by proprietary models locked inside big tech companies, is being disrupted by a new wave of open-source models.

value.title: Cramer Says 'Will Not Sell' Nvidia Stock On 'Misinformation' About Microsoft AI Chip
value.excerpt: Cramer shrugged off a report that said Microsoft is prepping to give Nvidia a run for its money with an in-house designed AI chip.

value.title: Samsung accelerates efforts to lead AI chip market
value.excerpt: Samsung Electronics made a series of announcements demonstrating its competitiveness in semiconductor production, as the chip industry expands alongside artificial intelligence (AI) and the emergence of ChatGPT.

value.title: US poised to tighten restrictions on chip equipment exports to China
value.excerpt: A rule aimed at restricting exports of U.S. chipmaking equipment to China is in the final stages of review, suggesting the Biden administration is tightening restrictions on Beijing.

value.title: NVIDIA DGX Cloud Gives CSPs And Their Customers Exactly What They Want: Fast AI, Fast
value.excerpt: While some may confuse this as NVIDIA competing with cloud service providers (CSPs), the DGX Cloud AI is offered in close partnership with CSPs, who love getting revenue without the hassles. And enterprises love access to state-of-the-art hardware and software in their favorite cloud.

value.title: European Commission to keep track of AI and semiconductor chips
value.excerpt: Sources revealed that on October 3, 2023, European Union officials mentioned that they have identified four areas that need assessment regarding technology risk and risk of technology leakage. The areas are believed to include AI, advanced semiconductor technologies, quantum technologies and biotechnologies.

value.title: Lemurian Labs is building a new compute paradigm to reduce cost of running AI models
value.excerpt: Lemurian Labs is an early stage startup with a big ambition to build a software and chip solution to make processing LLMs more efficient.
